contents.questionText: Has this case been referred as a Critical Public Protection case? (Refer to the Public Protection manual)
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (referred as critical public protection case?)"}}

contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (should case be referred now?)"}}

contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (should case be referred pre-release?)"}}

contents.questionText: Is the individual required to register under the Sex Offender Act 1997?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (required to register under Sex Offender Act?)"}}

contents.questionText: If yes, have they registered?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (have they registered?)"}}

contents.questionText: Is the individual disquaified from working with children as set out in Section 35 (4) of the Criminal Justice & Court Services Act 2000?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (are they disqualified from working with children?)"}}

contents.questionText: Does the individual have a present or previous conviction against a child?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (have they  present or previous conviction against a child?)"}}

contents.questionText: Does the individual present an ongoing risk to children?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (are they an ongoing risk to children?)"}}

contents.questionText: Do the Police, Local Authority and Offender Manager need to be notified prior to the release of the individual from custody?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (notification to authorities prior to release)"}}

contents.questionText: Is the individual subject to Prison Service Order 4400 Prisoner Communications?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (subject to Prison Service Order 4400?)"}}

contents.questionText: Is the individual a conditionally discharged patient under Section 41 of the Mental Health Act 1983?
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (conditionally discharged under Mental Health Act?)"}}

contents.questionText: Is the individual on life licence following a sentence of imprisonment or detention for public protection? (Section 230, schedule 18)
contents.validation: {"mandatory":{"errorMessage":"Select yes or no","errorSummary":"Select yes or no (on life licence?)"}}
